prop.category.label.ftb.tooltip: Edit the Client defaults for FTB Teams integration.
prop.option.label.ftb.default.team_color: This is used if there is a failure to get the team color.
prop.option.label.ftb.ally_color.tooltip: This is the color that is used for Allies if override is enabled.
prop.option.label.ftb.override_ally.tool: By default allies are the color of their team. Use this if you want to set the color for all allies.
prop.category.label.vanilla.tooltip: Edit the Client defaults for Vanilla Teams integration.
prop.option.label.vanilla.team_color.too: This is used to color your teamates on the map.
